short_summary: Delivery of a Non-Stirred, Instrumented Pressure Vessel including a one year warranty and Service and Maintenance Support Services.
description: Natural Resources Canada - CanmetENERGY Ottawa has a requirement for
full_summary:
================

### Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title**: Natural Resources Canada (NRCAN) - Instrumented Pressure Vessel Acquisition

**Project Reference Number**: CB-5596-19181321

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

**Publication Date**: May 16, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: June 26, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Tender Status**: Expired

**Project Description**: Natural Resources Canada's CanmetENERGY (Ottawa) seeks to acquire a Non-Stirred, Instrumented Pressure Vessel. This bid opportunity includes a one-year warranty and a one-year Service and Maintenance Support agreement.

**Key Requirements**

* One (1) Non-Stirred, Instrumented Pressure Vessel
* One (1) year warranty
* One (1) year Service and Maintenance Support Services
* Compliance with all relevant regulations and standards

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering

**Trade Agreements**: This project is open to bidders from participating countries under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada

**Contracting Entity Address**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4, Canada

**Contact Information**

* Julia Pace
* Email: julia.pace@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
* Phone: (902) 719-4856

**Tender Documents**: Available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5596/npp---nrcan-5000073891---en.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5596/apm---nrcan-5000073891---fr.pdf (French)

**Delivery Region**: National Capital Region (NCR),
